skills.title: Front-end Developer
skills.description: I design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.

skills.title: Graphics Designer
skills.description: Beyond coding, I have a creative edge with skills in graphic design

portfolio.title: HaTech: A Modern Platform Offering Web Services and Electronic Products
portfolio.description: The HaTech website is a comprehensive platform designed to offer both tech services and electronic products. It serves as a hub for clients seeking website maintenance, development, and design services, as well as a marketplace for electronics. The design and development of the website focus on creating a seamless user experience with a clean and intuitive interface. The site features responsive layouts, organized navigation, and strategic calls to action that guide users through service offerings and product selections. This project highlights my ability to integrate e-commerce functionalities with service-based features, demonstrating my skills in front-end development, UX/UI design, and creating a professional digital presence for tech-related businesses.

portfolio.title: Interactive Color Selector: Dynamic Background Changing with Hex Codes
portfolio.description: This front-end app allows users to input a hexadecimal color code to dynamically change the background color of the page. Built with simplicity and user interaction in mind, the application demonstrates basic DOM manipulation and event handling using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The primary focus was to create an intuitive and responsive user interface that reacts instantly to user input, providing real-time feedback through color changes. This project showcases my understanding of core front-end development concepts and how to apply them in interactive web applications.

portfolio.title: Dash: Crafting a Clean and Engaging Portfolio Landing Page
portfolio.description: In this project, I designed the landing page for my personal portfolio website, Dash, with a focus on user experience and a minimalist aesthetic. The goal was to create a visually appealing and intuitive interface that clearly communicates my skills as a UX/UI designer and front-end developer.The design features a clean layout, smooth navigation, and strategic use of whitespace to guide the user's attention to key elements such as the portfolio, services, and call-to-action buttons. By incorporating modern design principles and ensuring responsive functionality, I aimed to enhance both visual engagement and usability across different devices.

testimonial.title: Wordpress developer
testimonial.description: Hailu has been an invaluable asset to our team as our front-end developer. His attention to detail, responsiveness, and ability to bring designs to life with clean, efficient code is truly impressive. The websites he has built for us have not only been visually stunning, but also highly functional and user-friendly. I highly recommend Hailu for any front-end development projects.

testimonial.title: IcogLab intern
testimonial.description: Working with Hailu on our website redesign project was a dream. He took the time to understand our business objectives and target audience, and then delivered a website that perfectly matched our vision. Hailu's front-end development skills are top-notch. The end result is a website that not only looks great, but also provides an exceptional user experience

testimonial.title: Coworker at CheapDelala
testimonial.description: Hailu is a true master of React. His ability to craft complex, dynamic user interfaces using React's component-based architecture is truly remarkable.The websites he has built for us using React have been highly scalable, performant, and a delight to use. I would recommend Hailu to any company looking for a skilled React developer to bring their front-end vision to life.
